languages.text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт кривится.{/n} "Жертвы, безумие, боль и смерть... даже в столь примитивном обществе, как это, подобные обряды кажутся чем-то... слишком напрасным, чтобы тратить на это такие силы. Что это — случайное проявление натуры, или же нечто более темное?.."

{n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт кривится.{/n} "Жертвы, безумие, боль и смерть... даже в столь примитивном обществе, как это, подобные обряды кажутся чем-то... слишком напрасным, чтобы тратить на это такие силы. Что это — случайное проявление натуры, или же нечто более темное?.."

{n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"

{n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"

{n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの顔が歪む。{/n}「犠牲、狂気、苦痛、そして死…ここと等しく原始的な社会ですら、そうした儀式はある…努力に見合わない、無意味なものだ。これは自然の気まぐれで生じたのか？それよりも深い闇から来たのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの顔が歪む。{/n}「犠牲、狂気、苦痛、そして死…ここと等しく原始的な社会ですら、そうした儀式はある…努力に見合わない、無意味なものだ。これは自然の気まぐれで生じたのか？それよりも深い闇から来たのか？」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特的脸扭曲着。{/n} “献祭、疯狂、痛苦和死亡……即使在如此原始的社会里，这样的仪式也显得……毫无意义，不值得为此大费周章。这究竟是大自然的一时兴起，还是另有隐情？”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特的脸扭曲着。{/n} “献祭、疯狂、痛苦和死亡……即使在如此原始的社会里，这样的仪式也显得……毫无意义，不值得为此大费周章。这究竟是大自然的一时兴起，还是另有隐情？”

languages.text: {n}A Yrliet se le encoje el rostro.{/n} «Sacrificios, locura, dolor y muerte... Incluso para una sociedad tan primitiva como esta, tales ritos... no tienen sentido; no merece la pena llegar a tales extremos. ¿Es esto un capricho de la naturaleza o algo más tenebroso?».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A Yrliet se le encoje el rostro.{/n} «Sacrificios, locura, dolor y muerte... Incluso para una sociedad tan primitiva como esta, tales ritos... no tienen sentido; no merece la pena llegar a tales extremos. ¿Es esto un capricho de la naturaleza o algo más tenebroso?».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Opfer, Wahnsinn, Schmerz und Tod ... selbst in einer so primitiven Gesellschaft wie dieser wirken solche Rituale ... sinnlos, die Mühe nicht wert. Was soll das sein, eine zufällige Laune der Natur oder etwas Dunkleres?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Opfer, Wahnsinn, Schmerz und Tod ... selbst in einer so primitiven Gesellschaft wie dieser wirken solche Rituale ... sinnlos, die Mühe nicht wert. Was soll das sein, eine zufällige Laune der Natur oder etwas Dunkleres?"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet grimace.{/n} « Sacrifices, folie, douleur et mort... Même dans une société aussi primitive que celle-ci, de tels rites semblent insensés et ne méritent pas de tels efforts. Serait-ce une étrange anomalie présente chez ces individus, ou quelque chose de plus sombre ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet grimace.{/n} « Sacrifices, folie, douleur et mort... Même dans une société aussi primitive que celle-ci, de tels rites semblent insensés et ne méritent pas de tels efforts. Serait-ce une étrange anomalie présente chez ces individus, ou quelque chose de plus sombre ? »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in yüzü seğiriyor.{/n} "Kurbanlar, delilik, acı ve ölüm. Böylesi ilkel bir toplum için bile bu tip ayinler son derece mantıksız duruyor. Bu kadar çabaya değmez. Ne anlama geliyor bu? Doğanın rastgele bir tezahürü mü yoksa daha karanlık bir şey mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face twists.{/n} "Sacrifices, madness, pain, and death... even in so primitive a society as this, such rites seem... senseless, not worthy of such efforts. What is this, a random quirk of nature, or something darker?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in yüzü seğiriyor.{/n} "Kurbanlar, delilik, acı ve ölüm. Böylesi ilkel bir toplum için bile bu tip ayinler son derece mantıksız duruyor. Bu kadar çabaya değmez. Ne anlama geliyor bu? Doğanın rastgele bir tezahürü mü yoksa daha karanlık bir şey mi?"
